Aniket Srinivasan Ashok

Undergraduate @ University of Waterloo

Email GitHub LinkedIn Resume

I study at the University of Waterloo. I like ML research and pure mathematics.

Currently, I’m at Viggle AI working on product and applied AI. This summer, I’ll be joining Faire to work on ML platforms. I also research training methodologies for multimodal image editing adapters. Send me an email if you want to build with me.

I’ve lived in India, Thailand, Morocco, and Singapore. Now, I’m in Canada.


Things I’m Doing

  • Eating and putting my thoughts in Plate.
  • Sometimes hosting research hackathons (you should come!).
  • Reading ML papers.


Things I’ve Done

  • I went on exchange to the National University of Singapore in Fall 2025.
  • I demoed at the Socratica Symposium 2025.
  • I built AI-native products for lawyers at CaseClock.
  • I researched wind dynamics super-resolution using conditional diffusion models.
  • I wrote algorithms for stable and deterministic module replacement in transformers with the Bradbury Group.
  • I engineered real-time solutions for unsupervised network anomaly detection by intentionally overfitting VAEs on network heatmaps.
